name: Compact Ham Library
summary: Learn about .HCF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HCF files can be edited by HCF Edit, a program included with the HAM Runtime installation.

description: File used by the HAM Runtime, a program used for running .HAM and .EHAM executables; can store both HAM and EHAM files; may also contain an md5 checksum, developer information, and other program information.
